title: Person of Interest - Shaw loves a fast car
author: RogueAnt
comment: There’s a few female characters that makes me feel safe in the world; Shaw from POI and Ziva from NCIS
I want a woman to look at me the way Shaw looks at this car. Lol

I love the mayhem twins, I sware they can read each others mind. Shaws colorful words are so funny. She is only staying for the dog, but Bear go right to John when he walks in. Doggie treats. After Joss died it was very hard to keep John in line. John has a death wish. All though season 4 he makes sure he stand in front of any bullett. Up untill Joss has a very strun talk to him, that is when John brakes.       Chirp
I love how the whole show is pretty much three bat shit crazy war children being guided by a mad scientist
